content: this digital pdf pattern for a jolteon amigurumi crochet doll stands at approximately 3 15 inches or ~8cm tall when finished excluding the ears so from the base to the top of the head no physical doll will ship this is a digital instruction booklet for making your own this is an ad-free digital download of a pattern that can be found for free on my website at www 53stitches com the pattern includes 2 pdf documents one is a photo-tutorial of the pattern itself the other is a photo-tutorial document on the stitches and techniques used in the pattern for amigurumi beginners for this pattern you will need - 3 00mm crochet hook - polyester filling - 2x 10 00mm safety eyes - yellow yarn 8ply / dk - white yarn - black felt - fabric glue - yarn needle - scissors the pattern is written in us terms and worked in continuous rounds -------------------- this pattern is in english only the pattern cannot be copied or resold nor any of my photographs used you may sell any items made with it provided all photography is your own
